title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2011) 720p iTunes
description:
The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2011) 158 min

DESCRIPTION:
Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker. Based on the novel by Stieg Larsson.
